BLOCK.QRY: INSERT INTO EST_COMPLAINT_SUB_CAT_MST (NUM_HOSPITAL_CODE, NUM_COMPLAIN_CATEGORY_ID, NUM_COMPLAIN_SUB_CAT_ID, GNUM_SLNO, STR_COMP_SUB_CATEGORY, NUM_MAX_WAIT_PERIOD, NUM_HIGH_WAIT_PERIOD, GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM, GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GDT_LSTMOD_DATE, GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID, GSTR_REMARKS) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

UPDATE EST_COMPLAINT_SUB_CAT_MST SET STR_COMP_SUB_CATEGORY=?,NUM_MAX_WAIT_PERIOD=?,NUM_HIGH_WAIT_PERIOD=?,GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM=?,GSTR_REMARKS=? WHERE NUM_COMPLAIN_SUB_CAT_ID=? AND NUM_COMPLAIN_CATEGORY_ID=? AND GNUM_SLNO=?

UPDATE EST_COMPLAINT_SUB_CAT_MST SET STR_COMP_SUB_CATEGORY=?,NUM_MAX_WAIT_PERIOD=?,NUM_HIGH_WAIT_PERIOD=?,GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM=?,GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO=?,GSTR_REMARKS=? WHERE NUM_COMPLAIN_SUB_CAT_ID=? AND NUM_COMPLAIN_CATEGORY_ID=? AND GNUM_SLNO=?

UPDATE EST_COMPLAINT_SUB_CAT_MST T SET T.GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO=(TO_DATE(?,'DD-MON-YYYY')-1) WHERE T.GNUM_SLNO=(select max(B.GNUM_SLNO) from EST_COMPLAINT_SUB_CAT_MST B where B.NUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=T.NUM_HOSPITAL_CODE AND B.NUM_COMPLAIN_SUB_CAT_ID=T.NUM_COMPLAIN_SUB_CAT_ID) and T.NUM_COMPLAIN_CATEGORY_ID=? and T.NUM_COMPLAIN_SUB_CAT_ID=?

INSERT INTO EST_COMPLAINT_SUB_CAT_MST (NUM_HOSPITAL_CODE, NUM_COMPLAIN_CATEGORY_ID, NUM_COMPLAIN_SUB_CAT_ID, GNUM_SLNO, STR_COMP_SUB_CATEGORY, NUM_MAX_WAIT_PERIOD, NUM_HIGH_WAIT_PERIOD, GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM, GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GDT_LSTMOD_DATE, GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID, GSTR_REMARKS) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

INSERT INTO EST_COMPLAINT_SUB_CAT_MST (NUM_HOSPITAL_CODE, NUM_COMPLAIN_CATEGORY_ID, NUM_COMPLAIN_SUB_CAT_ID, GNUM_SLNO, STR_COMP_SUB_CATEGORY, NUM_MAX_WAIT_PERIOD, NUM_HIGH_WAIT_PERIOD, GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM, GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GDT_LSTMOD_DATE, GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID, GSTR_REMARKS) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
UPDATE EST_COMPLAINT_SUB_CAT_MST T SET T.GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE NUM_COMPLAIN_SUB_CAT_ID=? AND T.NUM_COMPLAIN_CATEGORY_ID=? AND GNUM_SLNO=?
